gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Grizzlies 110, Pistons 108
gameRecap.excerpt: The Grizzlies defeated the Pistons, 110-108. Jaren Jackson Jr. led the way with 40 points, seven rebounds, and three steals for the Grizzlies, with Luke Kennard adding 19 points, eight assists, and three rebounds in the victory. Cade Cunningham tallied 36 points, eight assists, and four rebounds for the Pistons in the losing effort. The Grizzlies improve to 25-50, while the Pistons fall to 13-62.
